review: As we were planning to start a family I learnt that I have PCOD that made me very tensed and over worried. I was loosing all hope but ever since I met Dr Arpi I was at ease.  She explained it well to me and with lots of confidence she told me not to worry it will all happen in time she gave me hopes. Dear Dr Arpi if you are reading this.. please no I am trying to get an appointment to meet you but the clinic informed me that it‚Äôs been 2 weeks that you have stopped coming to the clinic I don‚Äôt know how can I reach to you. You had asked me to meet you after 3 months of my treatment which is due. Kindly help me out here I wish to consult only by you. Thank you
reply_text: Thank you so much.. reach out to me on my mail - arpi.lodha@gmail.com

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Arpi Lodha is a  lovely and humble doctor I can recommend people to meet. She always value a patient and make sure that you follow up all the clinic appointment and even the recommended medical treatment, even the patient diet on encouraging the pregnant mum and the unborn baby.. 
 Even when you seems to loose hope she will comfort and encourage you that make you feel your not alone on that struggle, Even when you forget to  check her on the appointment date, she will call and text to remind you and patiently waiting for you in the hospital. 

The most amazing part I won't forget and wishing to meet her every time and then it is because of her personality,,, for real even when Iam feeling so bad but when I see doctor Arpi I will automatically start smiling and laughing this is the amazing part  I will ever keep in my memories...
